name: Lumenous
overview:
Lumenous is a web application that makes it easy for businesses to manage and access financing and credit from a position of strength. Online tools help them meet credit and reporting requirements from stakeholders such as business partners, customers, investors and creditors. From Lumenous they can safely and selectively share the right amount of business and financial information at the right time all from one place.

Lumenous displays user-supplied information, such as the team’s LinkedIn profiles and uploaded financial reports, in visually appealing and interactive business profiles. Profiles present business performance the way it is evaluated by stakeholders–against key metrics and relative to like companies. The built-in invitation and notifications systems allows users to create and invite groups as well as keep track of who is accessing, commenting, rating and downloading reports from their profile.
